snippet: To the Editor:   A hearty well done to Molly O'Neill. "Arming the Armani Set" provided a revealing insight into yet another aspect of gun ownership: the elevation of handguns to "status symbol." Nevertheless, a couple of errors, perhaps typos, man...
lead_paragraph: To the Editor: A hearty well done to Molly O'Neill. "Arming the Armani Set" provided a revealing insight into yet another aspect of gun ownership: the elevation of handguns to "status symbol." Nevertheless, a couple of errors, perhaps typos, managed to creep into the text.
